text: Dana Bash (born Dana Ruth Schwartz; June 15, 1971) is an American journalist, anchorwoman and political correspondent. She is known for being a correspondent for CNN. Born in New York City to a Jewish family and raised in Montvale, New Jersey. Bash was one of the women honored at Elle magazine's 2014 "Women in Washington Power List" event. ==References== ==Other websites== * Dana Bash's profile at CNN Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:American Jews Category:CNN people Category:American political commentators Category:American television news anchors Category:Journalists from New York City Category:Journalists from New Jersey
title: Dana Bash
